entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Oxtongue Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:24 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -29.2°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 24. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
